title: Sick of people using "Salty"
body: It doesn't even make sense lol.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=yaiamone,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=LAlR9z02,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-02-09T11:29:23.625+0000)
>
> Neither does 'autistic', 'downy' or 'cancer'

they make sense you downy autistic cancer.
Teemo is a swore word, why not people get banned for it :(
Because 'Salty' is not a swear word, therefore even if you say it it's not bannable.

ADD syndrome , potato jackass, MF, Teemo makes more sense then Salty. 

Sweet sounds better than salty too. 

People who are sacred to tell you " Fruck u Mother Frucker" use the word "salty", to make it sound like they are less pissed and more well mannered. On the back of their mind, they would be plotting different ways to make you suffer lol I mean whether to use a gun, bazooka, trolling, ignoring your comments, use Teemo shrooms or a classic knife..
If you're being salty, it leaves a bad taste in my mouth, so to speak.
